text: The 2016 IIHF U18 World Championship Division II was a pair of international under-18 ice hockey tournaments organised by the International Ice Hockey Federation. The Division IIA and Division IIB tournaments represent the fourth and the fifth tier of the IIHF World U18 Championship. ==Division II A== The Division II A tournament was played in Brasov, Romania, from April 4 to 10, 2016. Division II A statistics |} {| class="wikitable" |- | style="background:#ccffcc;"| Promoted to the 2017 Division I B |- | style="background:#ffccff;"| Relegated to the 2017 Division II B |} ==Division II B== The Division II B tournament was played in Valdemoro, Spain, from March 26 to April 1, 2016. Division II B statistics |} {| class="wikitable" |- | style="background:#ccffcc;"| Promoted to the 2017 Division II A |- | style="background:#ffccff;"| Relegated to the 2017 Division III A |} ==References== Category:IIHF World U18 Championship Division II Category:2016 IIHF World U18 Championships 2016 2016 Category:March 2016 sports events in Europe Category:April 2016 sports events in Europe Category:Sport in Brașov Category:Sport in the Community of Madrid
title: 2016 IIHF World U18 Championship Division II
